alert.note: Alert for Amite; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 4:59PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western St. Helena, eastern West Feliciana, southeastern Pointe Coupee and East Feliciana Parishes, eastern Wilkinson and Amite Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 458 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gloster to 7 miles southeast of St. Francisville. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Roads, Jackson, St. Francisville, Clinton, Liberty, Centreville, Slaughter, Gloster, Wilson, Norwood, Wakefield, Smithdale, Spillman, Darlington, Gillsberg, Felps, Easleyville and Crosby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern Louisiana...and southern Mississippi.
